Summary: I woke up today with a stange cut on top of My hand
divs: sighting detailsi do believe i was either visited or abducted i remember nothing but woke up with a small 1\4 " cut right at the top of my thumb thing is i do have a problem with that thumb but on the other side. it appears that a surgeon went in from the top maybe to probe or diagnose it but no work was preformed. this all started after i witnessed a huge triangle ufo a few months ago. i dont know what to do but i no longer fear them.
